nodes.text: Omman Minor, best known as Omman, was a planet located in the Kibilini sector of the Outer Rim.
It was a planet located near Socorro with a wide diversity of cultures.

The planet Omman was created in When the Domino Falls, near Socorro. But after another planet Omman was mentioned in the Tion Cluster, the first was identified as Omman Minor by the The Essential Atlas Online Companion. Although it was published later, The Essential Reader's Companion didn't noticed this retcon.
